documents.name: Privacy notice
documents.text:
SchildiChatAndroid Desktop WebPrivacy notice

This website is hosted on a Hetzner cloud server.
It's technically inevitable to obtain some information like your IP address and the time of access.
This data is not processed in any technically unnecessary manner except for statistical analysis.
No cookies are set. 🍪😋

© 2021 SchildiChatContact Privacy notice Code

points.title: Features of the service are made available under a free software license
points.status: SchildiChat is Free and Open-Source Software (it is available on F-Droid, a repository for FOSS).

points.title: The software is open-source
points.status: The code source is available on GitHub.

points.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
points.quoteText: This data is not processed in any technically unnecessary manner except for statistical analysis.

points.title: Third parties are involved in operating the service
points.quoteText: his website is hosted on a Hetzner cloud server.

points.title: This service collects your IP address, which can be used to view your approximate location
points.quoteText: It's technically inevitable to obtain some information like your IP address and the time of access.

points.title: This service does not track you
The service does not use third-party analytics or tracking platforms
